nodes.name: Condemn
nodes.desc: When casting a skill that consumes Photon Energy, there is a 30% fixed chance for Basic Attacks to evolve into Condemn.

nodes.name: Lightforged Body
nodes.desc: Every 1 Holy Sigil consumed grants a Radiant shield equal to 30% ATK (depending on Adventurer Level, up to 60%).

nodes.name: Lightforged Fortitude
nodes.desc: During the duration of Radiant Shield, Block chance +10%.

nodes.name: Haste Sigil
nodes.desc: Each 1% haste increases the recovery speed of Holy Sigil by 1%, Holy Sigil recovery time = Holy Sigil initial recovery time / (1 + Holy Sigil recovery speed bonus).

nodes.name: Lightforge Continuum
nodes.desc: For every 20 points of Photon Energy consumed, gains Radiant Shield equal to 30% ATK (this ratio is affected by Adventurer Level, up to 60%).

nodes.name: Ring of Judgment
nodes.desc:
Casting Judgment generates a Divine Circle, with a CD of 30s.
Each Holy Sigil consumed reduces the remaining CD by 1s.

nodes.name: Condemn Time Limit
nodes.desc: When Condemn deals damage, it immediately cools down 1 Holy Sigil (prioritizing the Holy Sigil with the longest remaining CD).

nodes.name: Light of Condemn
nodes.desc: While inside a Divine Circle, your Condemn is enhancedâ€”thrusting a blade of light forward and dealing double DMG.

nodes.name: Life Enhancement
nodes.desc: When Strength reaches 500 points, Max HP +12%.

nodes.name: Blessing of Holy Sigil
nodes.desc: When using a Skill that consumes Holy Sigils, 20% chance for your next Holy Sigil-consuming skill to consume no Holy Sigils. The effect lasts for 8s or until a Holy Sigil-consuming skill is cast.

nodes.name: Energy Guard
nodes.desc: After Casting the Ultimate, the aggro generated by Allies is transferred to oneself, lasting for 6s.

nodes.name: Recovery Spec
nodes.desc:
Continue to enhance the ability to use Valor Bash.
Radiant Impact is accompanied by Radiant Impact, and when Radiant Impact hits an enemy target, it taunts them.

nodes.name: Holy Light Time Limit
nodes.desc: During Aegis Ward, when Expertise deal Crit DMG, there's a 50% fixed chance to instantly reset 1 Holy Sigil CD (prioritizing Holy Sigil with the longest remaining CD). This effect triggers only once when hitting multiple targets.

nodes.name: Radiant Guard
nodes.desc: Casting Shield Toss immediately grants a Radiant shield equal to 100% ATK (depending on Adventurer Level, up to 200%). The Overdrive of Shield Toss +1.

nodes.name: Divine Circle Defender
nodes.desc: While within the Divine Circle, the Armor effect provided by Valor Bash +30%.

nodes.name: Oracle
nodes.desc:
When a skill that consumes Holy Sigil critically hits, gain an additional 30% Light Energy.
Crit DMG of skills that consume Light Energy +30%.

nodes.name: Reckon Blaze
nodes.desc:
When Valor Bash deals Crit DMG, gain Blazing.
Casting Aegis Ward guarantees Blazing.
Blazing: For the next 10s, Reckoning evolves into Inferno Reckon.

nodes.name: Shield Impact
nodes.desc: Hold Valor Bash to charge, then dash forward a short distance.

nodes.name: Holy Barrier
nodes.desc: After casting the Ultimate, leaves a Holy Barrier that blocks damage for friendly targets within the area. The Holy Barrier disappears after taking total damage equal to 200% of the caster's Max HP or after 15s.

nodes.name: Reckon Shield
nodes.desc: Each time Inferno Reckon or Reckoning deals Crit DMG to 1 enemy target, Block chance +5%, lasting for 10s, stacking up to a maximum of 5 layers.

nodes.name: Lightforged Balance
nodes.desc:
When your HP percentage is higher than your target's, DMG taken from that target -5%.
When your HP percentage is lower than your target's, Judgment deals 50% more DMG.

nodes.name: Ultimate Guard
nodes.desc: For 10s after casting Shield Toss, increases Block Chance by 15%.

nodes.name: Holy Summon
nodes.desc: When Shield Toss or Judgment deals DMG, 10% chance to trigger Divine Strike. If Crit DMG is dealt, the chance increases to 50%.

nodes.name: Divine Circle Resonance
nodes.desc: For each enemy inside Divine Circle, increases Divine Circle DMG by 25% and Divine Circle Healing by 5% (caps at 10 enemies).

nodes.name: Halo
nodes.desc: Divine Circle now has a halo effect, stunning enemy targets for 3s the first time it deals DMG.

nodes.name: Fearless Shield
nodes.desc: Each time Shield Toss deals DMG, gains Radiant Shield equal to 25% ATK (this ratio is affected by Adventurer Level, up to 50%).

nodes.name: Sword Dance
nodes.desc: When a Expertise Skill critically heals, gain a 15% healing bonus.

nodes.name: Shield Guard
nodes.desc: When Valor Bash deals Crit DMG, restores HP equal to 120% ATK.

nodes.name: Aegis Ward's Anthem
nodes.desc: For every 2 Holy Sigils consumed, the remaining CD of Aegis Ward -1 second.

nodes.name: Holy Heal
nodes.desc: While having Radiant Shield, gains 12% healing bonus.

nodes.name: Judgment of All Beings
nodes.desc: When Judgment hits only 1 enemy target, its damage +25%.

nodes.name: Ultimate Strike
nodes.desc: When Divine Strike deals DMG, increases Strength by 2% for 10s, stacking up to 5 times.

nodes.name: Lightforged Greatsword
nodes.desc:
After every 10 casts of Judgment, the next Judgment is enhanced into Scorching Judgment.
Scorching Judgment: Summon a holy greatsword to descend upon the target area for 5s, healing yourself (Healing equal to that of Judgment) while dealing damage over time to nearby enemies and inflicting Scorch, totally dealing physical DMG equal to 600% ATK (scales with Judgment level/rank).
Scorch: Reduces damage taken from the target by 3% for 10s. Stacks up to 10 times. Grants 3 stacks of Scorch on Crit.

nodes.name: Light Chain
nodes.desc: While Aegis Ward is active, the chance of Divine Strike is doubled. Every 3 times Divine Strike is triggered, the duration of Aegis Ward is extended by 1 second.

nodes.name: Divine Circle Blessing
nodes.desc: While within the Divine Circle, your Healing Receive effect +10%.

nodes.name: Light Protection
nodes.desc: While having Radiant Shield, gain 5% Lightal Bonus.

nodes.name: Judgment Revelation
nodes.desc: When Divine Strike Crits, there's a 50% fixed chance to automatically cast Judgment on the target (this Judgment cannot trigger Divine Strike).

nodes.name: Aegis Ward's Retribution
nodes.desc:
During Aegis Ward, Block chance is increased to 1.5 times.
When attacked, reduces Aegis Ward's remaining CD by 0.5s. This effect can only trigger once per 1 second.

nodes.name: Shield Spec
nodes.desc:
Replaces Special Attack with Vanguard Strike and enhances its power.
Each additional enemy hit by Vanguard Strike grants 2 extra Photon Energy, up to 10.
Successfully Block prevents losing the stacks of Lightforged Barrier.

Lightforged Barrier: Each stack increases Max HP by 2%, up to 10 stacks, with each instance of DMG removing 1 stack. It lasts 25s or until all stacks are consumed. Gaining stacks resets the duration.

nodes.name: Resolved to Return
nodes.desc: Each time 1 stack of Lightforged Barrier is consumed or deducted, reduces the remaining CD of Radiance by 1 second.

nodes.name: Bold Fearless
nodes.desc:
When Sacred Blade or Judgment deals DMG, there is a fixed 25% chance to cause Vanguard Strike to evolve into Vanguard Hunt.
Vanguard Hunt: Deals Attack Damage equal to 240% ATK to the target, restores 2% of your max HP, and gains Indomitable Courage.
Indomitable Courage: Increases Haste by 3% for 10s, stacking up to 10 times.

nodes.name: Divine Circle Chant
nodes.desc: The recovery rate of Holy Sigils from Haste +100%.

nodes.name: Holy Radiance
nodes.desc:
When Sacred Blade hits an enemy target, it applies a Holy Mark to the target.
Vanguard Strike can spread this Holy Mark to hit enemy targets.

nodes.name: Conquest Pursuit
nodes.desc: While Zeal Crusade is active, Vanguard Strike evolves into Vanguard Hunt.

nodes.name: Adversity Enhancement
nodes.desc: Special Attack and damaging Expertise are enhanced based on missing HP. For every 1% HP lost, increases their DMG by 1%.

nodes.name: Holy Strike
nodes.desc: Each time 1 layer of Lightforged Barrier is consumed or deducted, 10% chance to obtain 1 Holy Sigil.

nodes.name: Holy Barrier
nodes.desc: After casting the Ultimate, leaves a Holy Barrier that blocks damage for friendly targets within the area. The Holy Barrier disappears after taking total damage equal to 200% of the caster's Max HP or after 15s.

nodes.name: Lightforged Drive
nodes.desc: When Casting Radiance, it automatically releases Judgment to up to 5 nearby enemy targets.

nodes.name: Lightforged Balance
nodes.desc:
When your HP percentage is higher than your target's, DMG taken from that target -5%.
When your HP percentage is lower than your target's, Judgment deals 50% more DMG.

nodes.name: Zeal Haste
nodes.desc: For every 15 points of Photon Energy consumed, the remaining CD of Zeal Crusade -1 second.

nodes.name: Radiant Core
nodes.desc:
Vanguard Hunt can grant Radiant Core.
Repeatedly gaining Radiant Core reduces its 2s window.

nodes.name: Divine Circle Resonance
nodes.desc: For each enemy inside Divine Circle, increases Divine Circle DMG by 25% and Divine Circle Healing by 5% (caps at 10 enemies).

nodes.name: Overflow Healwall
nodes.desc: When your accumulated overhealing reaches 10% of your Max HP, gains 1 stack of Lightforged Barrier.

nodes.name: Divine Guard
nodes.desc: When in the Divine Circle, reduces all DMG taken by 10%.

nodes.name: Sigil Pursuit
nodes.desc: DMG dealt by Vanguard Hunt and Sacred Blade to targets with Holy Sigil increases by 20%.

nodes.name: Judgment Improvement
nodes.desc: For each 1 stack of Lightforged Barrier you possess, Judgment gains 2% bonus healing.

nodes.name: Ascension of the Lightforged Barrier
nodes.desc:
Maximum Light Energy +20.
When you have at least 5 stacks of Lightforged Barrier, the Judgment consumes 5 less Light Energy.

nodes.name: Light Healing
nodes.desc: While having Radiant Shield, gains 12% healing bonus.

nodes.name: Judgment of All Beings
nodes.desc: When Judgment hits only 1 enemy target, its damage +25%.

nodes.name: Ruthless Rewind
nodes.desc: During the duration of Zeal Crusade, each time 1 Holy Sigil is consumed, it overdrives Zeal Crusade by 1 layer. When the Overdrive reaches 3 layers, Zeal Crusade bursts outward, dealing 200% ATK Attack Damage and is guaranteed to critically hit.

nodes.name: Wide Raid
nodes.desc: Increases Zeal Crusade range by 100%. While Zeal Crusade is active, the effect of Indomitable Courage is doubled.

nodes.name: Divine Circle Blessing
nodes.desc: While within the Divine Circle, your Healing Receive effect +10%.

nodes.name: Determination Slash
nodes.desc: When Lightforged Barrier has fewer than 5 stacks, taking DMG no longer reduces its stacks. When Lightforged Barrier has 5 or more stacks, taking DMG has a 50% fixed chance not to reduce its stacks.

nodes.name: Light Protection
nodes.desc: While having Radiant Shield, gain 5% Lightal Bonus.

nodes.name: Decisive Blade
nodes.desc: After Radiant Core explosion, Sacred Blade DMG +100% for 20s. Stacks up to 3 charges, casting Sacred Blade consumes one charge.

nodes.name: Holy Sigil Enhancement
nodes.desc: When Judgment deals DMG, the target takes double DMG from Holy Sigil for the next 5s.
